summary: Upgrade the Admin Dashboard into a full control panel with new sections for Vendor Management and Orders Panel accessible via visible cards and menu options.

existing_features.title: Upgrade the /admin landing page into an Admin Control Panel that shows visible navigation cards and menu options for the admin sections: Vendor Management and Orders Panel (and keep existing admin sections accessible).
Implement the Vendor Management admin section to support: viewing all vendors, approving/rejecting vendors, enabling/disabling vendor outlets, and viewing vendor documents.
Implement the Orders Panel admin section to support viewing all orders, filtering by city (Kanpur, Unnao), and order status tracking.

new_feature_requests.summary: Upgrade Admin Dashboard into a full control panel with visible cards and menu options for admin sections
Add Vendor Management section: view all vendors, approve/reject vendors, enable/disable vendor outlet, view vendor documents
Add Orders Panel section: view all orders, filter by city (Kanpur, Unnao), order status tracking
Extend the backend vendor model and APIs so the admin UI can approve/reject vendors and fetch vendor documents for viewing.
Extend the backend order model so each order has a city value that can be used by the admin Orders Panel filter (Kanpur/Unnao), and ensure existing order creation provides/populates this value.

projectName: Upgrade Admin Dashboard into a full admin control panel (Vendor Management + Orders Panel)
